CHAT.comment: STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY, Petitioner v. INEZ PREECE CAMPBELL AND MATTHEW C. BARNECK, SPECIAL ADMINISTRATOR AND PERSONAL REPRESENTATIVE OF THE ESTATE OF CURTIS B. CAMPBELL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF SHEILA L. BIRNBAUM ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LAURENCE H. TRIBE ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF SHEILA L. BIRNBAUM ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:06 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
